General.Name: Commander Resources Ltd
General.Description: Commander Resources Ltd. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of moineral properties in Canada and Mexico. The company explores for gold, copper, nickel, and zinc deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Flume property located in Yukon; Henry Lee, Omineca, Mt. Polley, and October Dome properties located in British Columbia; and the First Loon and the Sabin properties located in Ontario, as well as interests in Burn property located in British Columbia; Nepisiguit property located in New Brunswick; South Voisey's Bay property located in Labrador; and Pedro property located in Mexico. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V6
